Summary: looked like three gease became one the broke apart became one again then flew straight up ....did not follow standard v formation
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my deck, when I witnessed three geese moving left to right in a line not a standard v pattern as they got closer I realized they where not geese and then joined into a solid ball.... They did this once more before rocketing upwards out of sight . Before they first joined there was a two foot gap between them
